Description: The following statement contains a magic number: preprocessedTemplate.TestResults =                  from i in Enumerable.Range(0' 40)                  select new TestResult                  {                      Id = Guid.NewGuid()'                      Name = "Test" + i'                      Passed = i % 2 == 0                  };
